item.description:
We are happy to announce that the world famous economist and President of EuroPacific Capital Peter Schiff and Iraq war veteran Adam Kokesh will be at Webster Hall for the Rand Paul event.

Minimum $25 donation. We would like a great turnout for this event in the City if you can make it. If there is alot of interest we'll coordinate to meet at a train station where parking is available and take the train in together. Otherwise, we could car pool.

Sponsored by the NYC Campaign for Liberty:
New: No t-shirts promoting other causes, focus is on Rand Paul.
This event is being considered a business event, minimum business casual please is their request.


GREAT NEWS!

Due to the overwhelming demand from Tri-State and Pennsylvania meetup groups, we overbooked our previous venue and have moved this event to the world famous Webster Hall.

Dr. Rand Paul, son of former Presidential Candidate Congressman Ron Paul, will be in New York City on Wednesday August 5th to make a MAJOR announcement regarding the Kentucky 2010 Senate Race.
Afterwards, The NYC Campaign for Liberty will be throwing a fundraiser in Dr. Rand Paul's honor with a personal meet & greet with Rand. Come enjoy drinks and music with fellow liberty lovers. The media will be there.

There will be a 3-tier donation system as follows;
$25 for "Friends of Rand Paul"
$50 for "Patron's of Rand Paul"
$100 for "Benefactors of Rand Paul"

Benefactors will receive a Constitution Autographed by both Dr. Rand & Dr. Ron Paul, as well as an individual photo with Rand.

Please join us in support of a fellow Rand Paul on Wednesday at Webster Hall www.websterhall.com

Webster Hall
125 E 11th St
New York, NY 10003
(212) 353-1600


barbara g.
item.name: Rand Paul at Webster Hall NYC
